content:
#!/bin/bash

module load java/1.8.0_20 python/3.5.1 gcc/4.8.2

# usage: 
# remove the log, run a "does it move" test on milestone 5, & log it
#    rm ati/M05.io.log; ati/test_io M05 | tee ati/M05.io.log

# "do anything" test:
#cfg0="-nogui -g:0 -h:9 -w:7 -k:1 -t:5000 -b:30000"  ## connect-k bug
cfg0="-nogui -g:0 -h:9 -w:7 -k:2 -t:5000 -b:30000"

echo "Processing " ${1} " : "
echo "team, language, moves?, error"

JAR="ConnectK_nolog.jar"

for dir in Submissions/${1}_*/${2}* ; do
  found=''
  for ai in "$dir"/*/src/*AI.py ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo -n ${gname} ",  python, "
    echo -n "  moves? "
    #python3 $ai < boards/ttt0.txt 2>&1| grep -e ReturningThe || printf "\n"
    java -jar $JAR $cfg0 "py:${ai}" py:ati/src/TestRandomAI.py  
    found=1
  done
  for ai in "$dir"/*/bin/*AI.class ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo -n ${gname} ", java, "
    echo -n "  moves? "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg0 "${ai%.*}" py:ati/src/TestRandomAI.py  
    found=1
  done
  #for ai in $dir/*/bin/*AI ; do
  for ai in "$dir"/*/bin/*AJ ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo -n ${gname} ", cpp, "
    echo -n " moves? "
    #$ai < boards/0.txt 2>&1| grep -e ReturningThe || printf "\n"
    java -jar $JAR $cfg0 "cpp:${ai}" py:ati/src/TestRandomAI.py  
    found=1
  done
  if [ ! $found ] ; then 
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo $gname ", missing, --, --" ; 
  fi
  echo
  echo "======================================================================================="
  echo
done
